The spike pointing the wrong way and the: A mendicant whose mind is pointing the wrong way cannot break ignorance, produce knowledge, and realize extinguishment.
A mendicant whose mind is pointing the right way can break ignorance, produce knowledge, and realize extinguishment.
The mind of a person whose mind is corru: Corruption of mind is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
Purity of mind is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
The lake that was cloudy, murky, and mud: A mendicant whose mind is clouded would not know what’s for their own good, the good of another, or the good of both; or that they would realize any superhuman distinction in knowledge and vision worthy of the noble ones: this is not possible.

A mendicant whose mind is not clouded would know what’s for their own good, the good of another, or the good of both; or that they would realize any superhuman distinction in knowledge and vision worthy of the noble ones: this is possible.
The pliability and workability of the mi: The boxwood is said to be the best kind of tree in terms of its pliability and workability.
A mind that is developed and cultivated is pliable and workable.
The quickness of the mind to change (a c: The mind is quick to change.
It’s not easy to give a simile for how quickly the mind changes.
The radiant mind (a comparison) [an1.50:: But it’s corrupted by passing corruptions.
And it is freed from passing corruptions.
